content.question:
<math alttext="2 H 2 S gas, plus 3 O 2 gas, react to produce, 2 H 2 O, liquid, plus 2 S O 2 gas; delta H naught equals negative 1120 kilojoules per mole of reaction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>S</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>→</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>l</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><msub><mrow><mtext>SO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="2.0em"></mspace><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><msup><mrow><mi>H</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>°</mi></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1120</mn><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>kJ/mol</mtext></mrow><mrow><mi>r</mi><mi>x</mi><mi>n</mi></mrow></msub></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>
Based on the reaction represented by the chemical equation shown above, what is the amount of heat released when <math alttext="4.00 moles" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4.00</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="H 2 S gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>H</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext></mtext><mrow><mtext>S</mtext><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> reacts with <math alttext="9.00 moles" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>9.00</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>mol</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> of <math alttext="O 2 gas" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>?

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
